mapper.select: SELECT max(blog_name) as name, max(blog_address) as address, max(created_at) as latestUpdatedAt, count(link) as postCount FROM blog_post GROUP BY blog_address ORDER by latestUpdatedAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}

SELECT blog_name as blogName, blog_address as blogAddress, title, description, link, created_at as createdAt FROM blog_post WHERE blog_address=#{address} ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}
SELECT count(1) FROM blog_post WHERE blog_address=#{address}
SELECT blog_name as blogName, blog_address as blogAddress, title, description, link, created_at as createdAt FROM blog_post ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_post ( blog_name, blog_address, title, description, link, created_at ) VALUES ( #{blogName}, #{blogAddress}, #{title}, #{description}, #{link}, #{createdAt} )
